income_messages:
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-28 11:06:26
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
  Dear Sir,
I hope this letter finds you in good health.
I am interested in discussing possible opportunities in viable
projects and investment opportunities within your sector which is
currently being pursued or developed. Al Habtoor Group LLC (AHG LLC)
is an investment and asset management firm based in Dubai, UAE. We
manage private investment portfolio and re-invest same through a
globally diversified investment and project opportunities not limited
to the following sectors: Real Estate/Construction/Property
Development Projects, Agriculture, Agribusiness Projects, Energy
(Clean Tech, Biotechnology, Renewable, Solar/Photovoltaic projects),
Telecommunication, ICT, AI and Software development Projects etc.
Currently, we wish to re-invest through project financing and
investment opportunities globally; hoping to invest in projects and
business ventures that can generate up to 8% ROI annually. Our offer
for investment is based on loan/debt financing at 4% interest rate
annually throughout the duration 5 - 10 years with 1 year grace
period.
We look forward to your response on possible projects and investments
opportunities for cooperation. Reply to this email:
Email:trillesmunozhabtorinvestment@gmail.com
Sincerely,
Dr. Trilles Munoz Leopoldo
Director of Intl. Projects
Tel: +32 460 201 521
Tel: +1 315 221 8133
Fax: +1 209 796 32   
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-28 18:22:36
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Mr. Allen,
Let me tell you who we are and what we do. We are a private registered UAE
company with our Head Office in Dubai. I have the mandate from the Chairman
on behalf of some private investors who wish to invest funds in any large
scale viable project with good ROI. These funds range from USD 1M to 2B+.
We are ready to facilitate and fund any business or project that is capable
of generating 8% annual return on investment (AROI).
From these funds, we are also able to provide financial banking instruments
such as BGs and comfort letter of credits for projects requiring such
support. If you have any clients in need of a term loan or credit line to
support an existing project, we can be able to work with such individuals.
We also give a 2% broker/finder fee for any successfully completed funding.
Please acknowledge the receipt of this email. I look forward to hearing
from you soon
I'm traveling all week but I will try to keep in touch.
Regards,
Trilles Munoz
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-28 20:37:52
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Allen,
All that will be addressed in the NDA. We are open to funding any type of
project as long as it will yield good revenue and it will be my pleasure
working with you and your organization.
The most important document I'll be needing is (I) Business Plan (II)
Financial Projection in anticipation of a profitable business relationship
with your group for our proper study.
We do strictly debt finance which is a term Loan at -5% interest rate
depending on the project/location/IRR.
Our investors are mainly GCC based and members of MENA. We are interested
in funding any lucrative project provided that will guarantee the security
of capital invested.
Our preferred areas of funding are Real estate, Health Care/Medical,
Manufacturing, Oil and Gas, Agric. Transportation/logistics, Education,
Mining, Telecom, Equipment Financing and Hotel projects. We also fund
start-ups.
We have funds in our procession readily available and we need no bank loan
to fund any project that is lucrative and matches our preferred area of
funding. After signing an NDA I'll send you the investors detailed profile
of Him and His Family business venture for your better understanding.
Our evaluation process is simple. After you sign the NDA with me, I will
connect you directly with the Investor so as to proceed with business
negotiation. If your project is approved by our wealth management team then
we can start a formal discussion and documentation process.
I have to make one point clear to you as we need to understand each other's
point of view before entering into any business venture. The investor has a
large network of partners both within and outside his organization and will
not want any of them to know where or how he reinvests his returns so I
hope you're capable of protecting his interest in the above matter?
Should you still be interested, our NDA is available upon request.
Please acknowledge the receipt of this email and I look forward to hearing
from you.
-
Regards,
Trilles Munoz
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-29 17:40:26
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Allen,
If your business plan is considered, the process could take a week. Can we
see your business plan to commence.
Trilles Munoz
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-31 09:42:55
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Allen,
It's all on the letter, kindly read and understand the process before we
commence.
Trilles
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-31 12:08:41
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Allen,
You must at least have a good business plan on a prospective and viable
business to achieve or generate 4% ROI per annual.
From: t**************************t@gmail.com
To: sl26587@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-01 10:50:24
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Mr Allen,
What is your present occupation? Do you intend to expand? What are you
proposing. Please go through my previous emails and intimate yourself with
a better understanding of the whole process.
Dr Trilles Munoz

SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Sir,
Dear Dr.,

 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo
___________________________________

Greater London

 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo

Greater London

SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,

 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo

Allen Saucedo,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: sl26587@m**************m
To: t**************************t@gmail.com

SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Hi, 
What is the interest rate on the loan?
 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo
___________________________________
Allen Saucedo,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: sl26587@m**************m
To: t**************************t@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-31 11:08:25
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Hi, 
Are there any special requirements or qualifications to be eligible for the loan?
 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo
___________________________________
Allen Saucedo,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
From: sl26587@m**************m
To: t**************************t@gmail.com
Time: 2023-03-31 13:08:00
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Hi, 
How much will my monthly payments be? If these aren't sustainable can we work out a different plan?
 Kind Regards,
Allen Saucedo
___________________________________
Allen Saucedo,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London
